spec_data.Name: perl-Data-Printer
spec_data.Description:
Data::Printer is a Perl module to pretty-print Perl data structures and
objects in full color. It is meant to display variables on screen, properly
formatted to be inspected by a human.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 08 Aug 2017 10:46:27 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Pretty printer for Perl data structures
